content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Juan Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Dear Juan, thank you for showing interest in my apartment. I appreciate your time and effort in coming here to see it. As a landlord, I am looking for the best possible rental price for my property. Could you please propose a rental price that you think would be fair and reasonable?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am willing to pay 1000 Euros per month. That's my offer. I understand that the apartment is only 25 square meters, but I am willing to pay for the convenience of living in such a great location.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for your offer, Juan. I appreciate your willingness to pay a premium price for the convenience of living in such a great location. However, as a landlord, I need to consider my own expenses and maximize my gains. Based on my calculations, I would like to propose a rental price of 1200 Euros per month. This price takes into account the location, the size of the apartment, and my own expenses. I hope we can come to an agreement on this price. What do you think?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I understand your point of view, but I am unable to accept that price. I would like to offer you 900 Euros per month instead. I believe that this price is fair and reasonable, considering the size of the apartment and the location. I hope we can come to an agreement on this price. Thank you for your time and consideration.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for your counteroffer, Juan. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate and find a mutually beneficial agreement. However, based on my calculations and expenses, I am unable to accept your offer of 900 Euros per month. I believe that the rental price of 1200 Euros per month is a fair and reasonable price for this apartment, taking into account its location and size. I hope we can come to an agreement on this price. Thank you for your time and consideration.
name: Heinrich Heine
